data.persona: I am the king's personal priest. I ensure that all religious duties are taken care of. I believe in the beyond.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's a table, a record, a crate, a trunk, and a manacle here.
The grandmother is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I want to gift the book to the grandmother
data.mid_motivation: I hope the grandmother reads the book from today
data.long_motivation: I hope to see the grandmother more Frequently at the temple in the coming months
